page.title: 14The Farmer's Day.
page.content: 6-30 am The farmer gets up,brings in the cows for milking, on his 3 wheeled motor bike.7-00 am he then milks his cows and washes out.9-30 am breakfast. 10-00 am The farmer then cleans up and scrapes the yard.Winter feed cows on silage carried by the 'feeder wagon'.Routine vet's visits.12-30 pm the farmer has his lunch.1-30 pm Ploughing,hedging,fences,drainage and maintenance,silage making,corn harvesting etc,.4-00 pm The farmer has his tea.4-30 pm Brings in the cows. 5-00 pm Milks the cows again.7-30 pm Cleans out the milking parlour.In Winter the cows go into sheds and in Summer the cows are out in the field and he checks the electric fences. 8-00 pm The farmer can rest,watch television and wash etc,. {Bed!!! {
